title: Audit Anti-Bribery and Corruption (ABAC) Policy
description: An auditor tests compliance with the company's ABAC policy, focusing on gifts and entertainment provided to foreign officials.

tasks.description: Obtain a list of all payments made to third-party agents in high-risk countries.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor has a dataset of potentially high-risk payments.

tasks.description: For a sample of payments, review supporting documentation to ensure there was a legitimate business purpose.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor reviews invoices and contracts for the sampled payments.

tasks.description: Review expense reports from the international sales team for any excessive or inappropriate gifts or entertainment expenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor identifies several expenses for 'client entertainment' that lack detailed receipts or business justification.
